info.title: Claim API
info.description: Claim API performs Nova claim operations and exposes the basic and core claim information.

get.summary: Returns information of claims of specific case using Nova case number.

200.description: Returns the case all type of amounts information

500.description: The server encountered an error while processing the request

get.summary: Returns all type of amounts information of specific case using Nova case number.

200.description: Returns the case all type of amounts information

500.description: The server encountered an error while processing the request

500.description: The server encountered an error while processing the request

500.description: The server encountered an error while processing the request

500.description: The server encountered an error while processing the request

get.summary: Returns information of claim using Nova claim number.

parameters.name: spec
parameters.description: Type of claim i.e. Invoice, CreditInvoice, Fee, DebtorCost

parameters.name: refId
parameters.description: Nova debt number/cost number based on type

500.description: The server encountered an error while processing the request

get.summary: Returns the all type of amounts (orginial, turned-in, paid and remaining) of specific claim for a debtor using Nova debtor number.

parameters.name: refId
parameters.description: Nova debt number/cost number based on type

500.description: The server encountered an error while processing the request

500.description: The server encountered an error while processing the request

get.summary: Returns the remaining amount for a debtor using Nova debtor number.

200.description: Returns the claim remaining amount information

500.description: The server encountered an error while processing the request

get.summary: Returns the all type of amounts (orginial, turned-in, paid and remaining) of specific case for a debtor using Nova debtor number.

500.description: The server encountered an error while processing the request

get.summary: Returns all the claims amounts for a debtor using Nova debtor number.

500.description: The server encountered an error while processing the request

ReferenceIdentifierDTO.description: Unique identification for the reference types (that cannot be identified by an unique identification number) within Nova.

ExternalIdentifierDTO.description: Provides more identification information of an entity typically used in other integrating/older/authority systems.

RegistrationDTO.description: Provides information about registration of an entity/object.

linkedCaseId.description: The case id on which this claim is associated with

invoiceDate.description: Date on which this claim is invoiced

dueDate.description: Date from which this claim is due

foreign.description: Indicates whether claim is from a foreign country. True if from foreign country.

ClaimDTO.description: Provides core information about a claim

AmountLayerDTO.description: Provides type of amount whether original or derived from limited commitment or adjudged amounts

turnedIn.description: The amount to be considered for debt collection

InterestSplitDTO.description: Provides distribution of interest among interest in capitalized and non-capitalized amounts

turnedIn.description: The amount to be considered for debt collection

InterestDTO.description: Provides distribution of all interest (original, turned-in and remaining) amounts.

ClaimAmountDTO.description: Provides distribution of all (original, turned-in and remaining) amounts on a claim.

principal.description: Principal remaining amount of a claim

interest.description: Interest remaining amount of a claim

ClaimRemainingAmountDTO.description: Provides information on remaining amounts on a claim.

CaseAmountDTO.description: Provides distribution of all (original, turned-in and remaining) amounts on a case. This involves accumulation of amounts from different debts and costs for a case.

principal.description: Summary (sum) of all the pricipal amounts of debts

interest.description: Summary (sum) of all the interest amounts calculated on debts

fee.description: Summary (sum) of all the fee amounts on debts

cost.description: Summary (sum) of all the cost amounts

costInterest.description: Summary (sum) of all interest amounts calculated on costs

CaseAmountDistributionDTO.description: Provides overall amount distribution of a case. This involves accumulation of amounts from different debts and costs for a case.

CaseRemainingAmountsDTO.description: Provides information on remaining amounts on a case.

turnedIn.description: The amount to be considered for debt collection

currencyCode.description: Foreign currency code in which this claim is registered

calculationDate.description: Date of calculation of currency conversions

exchangeRate.description: Exchange rate on the CalculationDate for given currency

ForeignClaimDTO.description: Provides information about claim from a foreign country

InterestConditionRoleDTO.description: Indicates where the interest is applicable

usedRate.description: Rate used for calculation of interest. Base rate is added into rate of interest for calculations

stopDate.description: Stop calculating interest on this date

InterestConditionDTO.description: Provides details for calculating interest on a claim

VatDetailDTO.description: Provides VAT information available on cost

Bearer.description: Authorization header using the Bearer scheme. Example: "Authorization: Bearer {token}"
Bearer.name: Authorization
